articles.title: S&P 500, Nasdaq end at nearly 14-month highs as May inflation data underscores expectations for Fed pause
articles.content: U.S. stocks ended higher Tuesday, with the S&P 500 and the Nasdaq Composite refreshing their highest closing values since April 2022.

articles.title: Younger workers know being remote has drawbacks, but they don’t care. Here’s why.
articles.content: 'I don’t think I would go for a job that is full-time in the office again," one respondent to a new survey said.

articles.title: Zuckerberg dismisses Apple Vision Pro headset as not 'affordable' at $3,500
articles.content: "A lot of people aren't going to find that to be affordable," Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg said about the $3,499 price of Apple's Vision Pro VR headset.

articles.title: Benzinga's Top Ratings Upgrades, Downgrades For June 13, 2023
articles.content:
Upgrades
According to Goldman Sachs, the prior rating for Oracle Corp (NYSE:ORCL) was changed from Sell to Neutral. For the fourth quarter, Oracle had an EPS of $1.67, compared to year-ago quarter EPS of $1.54. The current stock performance of Oracle shows a 52-week-high of $117.51 and a 52-week-low of $60.78. Moreover, at the end of the last trading period, the closing price was at $116.43.   
For BRP Inc (NASDAQ:DOOO), DA Davidson upgraded the previous rating of Neutral to Buy. BRP earned $1.76 in the first quarter, compared to $1.31 in the year-ago quarter. At the moment, the stock has a 52-week-high of $90.42 and a 52-week-low of $58.96. BRP closed at $75.06 at the end of the last trading period.   
For Ulta Beauty Inc (NASDAQ:ULTA), Loop Capital upgraded the previous rating of Hold to Buy. For the first quarter, Ulta Beauty had an EPS of $6.88, compared to year-ago quarter EPS of $6.30. The stock has a 52-week-high of $556.60 and a 52-week-low of $360.75. At the end of the last trading period, Ulta Beauty closed at $424.91.   
For Assurant Inc (NYSE:AIZ), Piper Sandler upgraded the previous rating of Neutral to Overweight. Assurant earned $2.75 in the first quarter, compared to $3.75 in the year-ago quarter. The current stock performance of Assurant shows a 52-week-high of $178.67 and a 52-week-low of $104.49. Moreover, at the end of the last trading period, the closing price was at $125.63.   
For Surmodics Inc (NASDAQ:SRDX), Needham upgraded the previous rating of Hold to Buy. For the second quarter, Surmodics had an EPS of $0.40, compared to year-ago quarter EPS of $0.22. At the moment, the stock has a 52-week-high of $39.53 and a 52-week-low of $16.00. Surmodics closed at $22.69 at the end of the last trading period.   
For Devon Energy Corp (NYSE:DVN), Goldman Sachs upgraded the previous rating of Neutral to Buy. In the first quarter, Devon Energy showed an EPS of $1.46, compared to $1.88 from the year-ago quarter. The stock has a 52-week-high of $78.82 and a 52-week-low of $44.03. At the end of the last trading period, Devon Energy closed at $49.40.   
HSBC upgraded the previous rating for StoneCo Ltd (NASDAQ:STNE) from Hold to Buy. StoneCo earned $0.14 in the first quarter, compared to $0.08 in the year-ago quarter. The stock has a 52-week-high of $14.60 and a 52-week-low of $7.21. At the end of the last trading period, StoneCo closed at $13.25.   
According to HSBC, the prior rating for PagSeguro Digital Ltd (NYSE:PAGS) was changed from Hold to Buy. In the first quarter, PagSeguro Digital showed an EPS of $0.23, compared to $0.21 from the year-ago quarter. At the moment, the stock has a 52-week-high of $19.49 and a 52-week-low of $7.51. PagSeguro Digital closed at $10.12 at the end of the last trading period.   
Morgan Stanley upgraded the previous rating for Urban Outfitters Inc (NASDAQ:URBN) from Equal-Weight to Overweight. For the first quarter, Urban Outfitters had an EPS of $0.56, compared to year-ago quarter EPS of $0.33. At the moment, the stock has a 52-week-high of $33.10 and a 52-week-low of $18.21. Urban Outfitters closed at $32.40 at the end of the last trading period.   
According to Citigroup, the prior rating for EastGroup Properties Inc (NYSE:EGP) was changed from Neutral to Buy. EastGroup Props earned $1.84 in the first quarter, compared to $1.68 in the year-ago quarter. The stock has a 52-week-high of $180.22 and a 52-week-low of $137.47. At the end of the last trading period, EastGroup Props closed at $169.77.   
For Editas Medicine Inc (NASDAQ:EDIT), Raymond James upgraded the previous rating of Market Perform to Outperform. In the first quarter, Editas Medicine showed an EPS of $0.71, compared to $0.74 from the year-ago quarter. The current stock performance of Editas Medicine shows a 52-week-high of $19.97 and a 52-week-low of $6.33. Moreover, at the end of the last trading period, the closing price was at $9.93.

articles.title: Why This Apple Analyst Is Downgrading The Stock As It Hits All-Time Highs
articles.content:
Shares of technology giant Apple Inc (NASDAQ: AAPL) recently hit all-time highs. The stock soared heading into the company's WWDC event and the unveiling of the Vision Pro headset. But, one analyst is downgrading shares despite the momentum.
The Apple Analyst: UBS analyst David Vogt downgrades shares of Apple from Buy to Neutral and raises the price target from $180 to $190.
Related Link: Apple Q2 Earnings Thump Estimates Buoyed By Robust iPhone Sales, Record Services Revenue 
The Analyst Takeaways: Vogt calls the investment case for Apple an unfavorable risk/reward with a large premium to the market and soft demand trends, especially the iPhone.
“We are downgrading Apple shares to Neutral from Buy given persistent softness in developed markets ...Full story available on Benzinga.com

articles.content: Even after a 41% gain this year, shares may still be a buy.
